Develop an AI-powered financial planning and investment management tool: This idea involves creating an AI-powered tool that can help individuals plan their finances and make informed investment decisions. The tool could use machine learning algorithms to analyze an individual's financial situation, risk tolerance, and investment goals to provide personalized recommendations.
